column4: Can any suggest a reason why I'd switch to Gutsy, if I have feisty installed and working w/ compiz?
not really, if it aint broke don't fix it :P
You sure?
well, didnt turn up when I did apt-cache search
there are debs for it actually
I don't believe in debs
using a different distro I suppose?
I think we can all learn to do sudo make install ./configure...not rocket science and helpful to learn
dependency hell :P
But, this is the way people learn
about?
About *nix.
If I never compiled, I'd have never learned about dependencies and all of that type stuff
Maybe one day we will be beyond that, but at this point I see linux as not only an O/S but a tool to learn
ok, cool I guess
no, don't think so
My recollection is that he is trying to avoid that
apparently no Vietnamese channel either, heh
not really simple :P like Photoshop vs. MS Paint :P
Samba does the job too, but NFS is preferred in native *nix environment
is NFS GUI? would it enable me to read the files of the NTFS partition...e.g. to play my mp3s?
as GUI as Samba :P
